lender.occupational_info:
http://www.kingsoncrusher.com Kingson Crusher is a high-technology professional enterprise of India and manufacturer of stone crusher and mining crusher. Kingson is one of the biggest manufacturer in crushing and grinding industry in the worls. Main products include Crusher, Jaw Crusher, Mobile Crusher, Impact Crusher, Cone Crusher, Vertical Shaft Impact Crusher, Horizontal Shaft Impact Crusher, Sand making machine, Ball Mill and other pertinent machines and equipments such as Vibrating Feeder, Grizzly Feeder, Vibrating Screen and Belt Crusher. Being a leading global manufacturer of crushing and construction equipment, we offer advanced, rational solutions for any size-reduction requirements, including quarry, aggregate, material handling production and complete plant plan. We also supply individual crushers and equippments as well as Crusher spare parts.
Crusher Products: Crusher, Crushers, Crusher India, Crushers India, Crusher manufacturer, Crusher manufacturer India, Crusher manufacturers India, Crushing, Crushing plants, Jaw Crusher, Jaw Crushers, Jaw Crusher India, Jaw Crusher manufacturer India, Impact Crusher, Impact Crushers, Impactor Crusher, Impactor Crushers, Impact Crusher India, Impact Crusher manufacturer India, Vertical Shaft Impact Crusher, Vertical Shaft Impactor Crusher, Horizontal Shaft Impactor Crusher, Horizontal Shaft Impactor Crusher, Cone Crusher, Cone Crusher India, Cone Crusher manufacturer India, Cone Crushers, Mobile Crusher, Mobile Crusher India, Mobile Crushers, Mobile Crushing Plant, Mobile Crushing Plants, Vibrating Screen, Vibrating Screen, Sand Making Machine, Sand Making Machines, Complete Crushing Plant, Complete Crusher Plant, Aggregate Plant, Aggregate Crusher Plant, Vibrating Feeder, Vibrating Feeders, Grizzly Feeder, Grizzly Feeder, Belt Conveyor, Belt Conveyors.

lender.occupational_info:
I prepare reviews of financial statements, which are engagements wherein my company provides moderate assurance that the client's stated results do not contain material misstatements. Usually, in the U.S., if a company has less than $10 million in debt, then the bank who owns that debt will only require a review, which is far less detailed than an audit.
Additionally, I prepare tax returns, which are documents that inform state and federal governments of how the taxpayer calculated the tax he/she owes the government(s).

lender.loan_because: I believe charity and aid-based structures of development are antiquated, psyched to engage in such an innovative approach as microenterprise/finance
lender.occupational_info: Analyzing ways to fix tomorrow, today

lender.name: Caseyann
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a Graduate student working on a PhD in Psychology. It's pretty intense, but I've always loved school and the field I've chosen keeps my attention and keeps me on my toes. To pay my bills (which become more substantial every month), I bartend and waitress part-time at a great traditional Mexican restaurant.

lender.name: Shawn and Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think most people need a hand up, not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with mental illnesses get a job.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I hope to help make a difference.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can. Others have a real need and I'm fortunate enough to be able to make a difference. I'm tired of being surrounded by money at work when I know there are millions who go without the basics of life.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I have the money to loan. I don't make a lot in the Administrative field but it's comparitively substantial to the loan applicants' income. I like the feeling of making a direct difference and plan to reinvest every penny back into Kiva loans.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I believe people should help each other.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: After 15+ trips to Peru I have an affinity for the people. I have been welcomed each time and on my 3rd trip to the Sacred Valley I had a very eye opening and heart changing day.
lender.occupational_info: I design for products and services and love to travel. I volunteer with VIDA - an organization that brings much needed medical relief to 13 countries Latin America.

lender.name: Anton
lender.loan_because:

lender.occupational_info: I direct learning centers for a community college where we give students extra help in their course work.

lender.occupational_info: Eat, sleep, play with my human employees!

lender.name: Menka
lender.loan_because: I want to donate in my father's memory. May his hardwork and positive attitude inspire others to forge ahead and make their dreams a reality.
